text: Jessy Druyts (born 22 January 1994) is a Belgian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team . Druyts is from a sporting family: her father, Ronny, played youth football with Beerschot AC and at the senior level with Dynamo Niel, where he was a champion in the Belgian Provincial leagues, her sister Steffy was a multiple national champion in gymnastics, and she is the sister of racing cyclists Kelly Druyts, Demmy Druyts, Lenny Druyts and Gerry Druyts. ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Jessy Druyts
